name: Luxenberg_Mid_Century_Modern_Barrel_Back_Design_Yellow_Accent_Chair_with_Nailhead_Trim
reviews: This chair is not only beautiful to look at but extremely comfortable to sit in even for long periods of time. I am very pleased with the roomy size, yellow color and good quality all true to the description and exactly what I was looking for. It was easy to put together without any experience. They get my highest recommendation to anyone looking for wingback chairs at great prices. Shipping and delivery was quick!!!

Just what I'd hoped for -- a stylish but tasteful look. This chair has a firm seat, but I find it very comfortable and roomy. I love the color and the fabric. Looks very rich. Very chic result. The only assembly is screwing in the legs, which was simple.
description: Update your living room with this unique looking accent chair that combineds ultimate design with comfortable seating. It is built from a solid wood construction for durability and longevity. The chair features a barrel back design with thick plush cushion seat upholstered in a soft yellow chenille fabric accented by nailhead trim with slighty flared legs and wood frame, finished in a weathered grey color that gives it an attractive and stylish look. This design combination exudes self expression while resonating with the contemporary chic lifestyle! Its modern style and attention to detail will bring designer sophistication to your home.Chair dimensions: 31.5 inches high X 29.25 inches wide x 31.5 inches deepSeat dimensions: 19 inches high x 22 inches wide x 22.75 inches deepFurniture Pattern: SolidChair Type: Accent Chairs, Wingback Chairs, Arm Chairs, Club ChairsMaterial: Wood, FabricStyle: Contemporary, Modern, Casual, Rustic, TransitionalAssembly: Assembly RequiredChair Back Height: StandardExact Color: YellowColor: Grey, YellowStyleCasual, Contemporary, Modern, Rustic, TransitionalMaterialFabric, WoodChair TypeAccent Chairs, Arm Chairs, Club Chairs, Wingback ChairsAccent TypeFramesAssemblyAssembly RequiredChair Back HeightStandardColorGrey, YellowFurniture PatternSolid
